findings.title: Truncation of token units
findings.description: The result will be truncated if it is calculated to be some non-integer number of cToken units or underlying token units, causing users to receive less than they theoretically should.

findings.title: Incorrect Code Comments
findings.description: The comment on line 906 of Comptroller.sol uses the variable newLiquidationDiscount when it should use newLiquidationIncentive.

findings.title: Require Statement Without Error Message
findings.description: The error propagation scheme violates the 'Fail Early and Loudly' principle, which can have serious security consequences.

findings.title: Non-traditional Use of ReentrancyGuard
findings.description: The nonReentrant modifier would typically be put on their external function counterparts in CEther.sol and CErc20.sol.
